name: Pinky Unicorn Piano Tiles 2019
description:
"Pinky Unicorn Piano Tiles 2019" is the newest piano tiles games this year and it's available on pink as you love.

If you are tired of traditional piano tiles game and white tiles, black tiles, you should try this. We designed pink and purpl tiles theme for you.

Amazing melodies and wonderful game play piano. Just with a light and fast touch on the screen, you can quickly become a skilled pianist with "Pinky Unicorn Piano Tiles" no worse than a genuine piano master.

Download "Pinky Unicorn Piano Tiles" now and play forever for free while improving your reaction speed and musical skill!

How to play:

- Tap on the black piano tiles continuously to play the music piano.
- Simple to play piano tiles, but difficult to master.
- Catching all the black tiles in this high speed musical game is definitely not easy!

Game Features:

- Smooth game playing experience
- Get experience, open new levels.
- Awesome game design and flat graphic
- High quality piano music soundtracks
- Features a large collection of piano songs
- 100% Free game music
